name: a tribute
description:
(note: when you can't see the player character, press --> to continue the scene.)

A game about Mew and some other things. Made for the Bitsy Essay Jam using bitsy and pixsy and bitsy audio <3

the game uses my adaption/interpretation of some sprites n tiles from the main series pokémon games. music is a midi version of bright eyes that I edited with beepbox lol

Read about Mew's history here!!! They're so cool and I still love them very much.
